properties.name: spring.view-component.local-development
properties.description: If set to true loads templates from the filesystem allowing for hot reload

properties.name: spring.view-component.view-action.enabled
properties.description: If set to true parses view:action properties to HTMX attributes

properties.name: spring.view-component.jte-template-directories
properties.description: Where are the jte templates located? Defaults to "src/main/java","src/main/kotlin"

properties.name: spring.view-component.jte-template-suffix
properties.description: Defaults to ".jte", if you want to use kte set it to ".kte"
